title: Dungeon Master of Slime Dungeon - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Abandoned Children   Crafting   Dungeon Master   Dungeons   Easy Going Life   Elemental Magic   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Lack of Common Sense   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Monster Tamer   Multiple POV   Pets   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Shiragai   White Street   白街
description:
When I woke up, I was in a room I didn’t know, and there was a crystal ball claiming to be a dungeon core. According to the crystal ball, I seem to have been selected as an experimenter for this dungeon core. Summoning a different world + dungeon management, isn’t it my favorite! I’ll be the strongest master … eh? Can only slime be summoned? Is it weaker than a baby if it hasn’t evolved?

Alright! Let’s sell to humans so as not to be killed! I also posted on Alpha Polis and Novel Up +>
